name: Groobix
overview:
Groobix offers a complete online business management & productivity suite, with several extremely simple and powerful applications designed to improve the performance of small businesses and workgroups of all kinds.

Groobix leverages the current cloud-computing trend and targets the 50MM (est.) small and medium enterprises around the world, which are steadily increasing their use of web-based applications to increase productivity while keeping their costs down.

The current application list (as of january 2010) includes Tasks, Projects, Direct Messages, Business Calendar, Notes, Document sharing, Sales management, Quotes, Billing, Collections, Customer Service, Field Service, Checks, Stocks and Order Processing.

These applications are sold in the “Groobix Store”, our online business application store to which new apps are frequently added. All apps have the same look and feel and follow similar sequences to perform functions. So adding a customer isnâ€™t different from creating a project. This makes the entire suite intuitive, keeping the learning curve small and productivity high, which is a must for small workgroups.

The main revenue stream is application monthly subscriptions. Channels and affiliattes are also a part of Groobix’ revenue model.
